TopicTitle: The Unofficial Official Space Shuttle Thread *Post Here*

Articles.Content:
This is my first post but just like others i have found the newest thing people are getting into. So come on and get on The Great Shuttle Boom Of 2014! Post all of your pictures of your shuttles Big or Small Wide or Skinny Join the Great shuttle boom!

Edited December 12, 2014 by DrawingNvada

How are we defining "shuttle" for the purposes of this thread? I have several shuttles I use for crew, satellite launch, and low mass fuel delivery runs but they're all SSTO spaceplanes. They're shuttles in the sense of being the service and maintenance workhorses of my space program but they don't work like the real shuttles at all.

Ooh since you didn't specify if mods were allowed ill post this,

Thats the CSS shuttle, there's a link in my sig.
